summary: Completed comprehensive testing of IPTV Management System. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has authentication context and clipboard permission issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Authentication token not properly persisted causing 403 errors on protected API calls
Clipboard write permission denied in user portal
Dev server overlay interfering with UI interactions

integration_issues.issue: Multiple 403 errors when accessing users, DNS, payments, settings data

passed_tests: All CRUD operations (users, DNS, payments, settings)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication context to properly persist and use JWT tokens in API calls. Implement proper clipboard API handling with fallback for copy functionality. The backend is fully functional - focus on frontend auth integration.
